item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司被判向被解雇的爱尔兰员工支付赔偿金
item.description: 在一起不公平解雇案中，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司被勒令向其爱尔兰分公司的一名前员工支付赔偿金。【原文：Elon Musk’s X has been ordered to pay compensation to a former staff member of its Irish unit in an unfair dismissal case.】

item.title: 钻石市场低迷，博茨瓦纳寻求更多安特卫普 HB 股份
item.description: 随着钻石市场的低迷，博茨瓦纳正寻求通过谈判获得比利时宝石贸易商 HB Antwerp 公司更多的股份。【原文：Botswana is looking to negotiate a bigger stake in Belgian gem trader HB Antwerp, following a slump in the diamond market.】

item.title: 伯福特援引阿根廷总督的话，要求赔偿 160 亿美元
item.description: Burford Capital 认为，阿根廷一位省长的讲话支持其推动美国法院向一家石油公司收取 160 亿美元的赔偿金，该公司认为该公司是哈维尔-米莱伊总统政府的 "另一个自我"。【原文：Burford Capital suggested that remarks by an Argentine provincial governor support its push to collect a $16 billion US court award against an oil company it argues is an “alter ego” of President Javier Milei’s government.】

item.title: 退出市场七年后，Coinbase 重返夏威夷
item.description: 在阔别七年之后，Coinbase Global 公司表示将恢复向夏威夷居民提供加密货币服务，夏威夷是该公司唯一没有开展业务的州。【原文：After a seven-year absence, Coinbase Global Inc. said it will resume offering crypto services to residents of Hawaii, the only state where it didn’t operate.】

item.title: 美国供应冲击后焦点转向需求，大豆跌幅扩大
item.description: 大豆期货跌幅扩大，创下 2020 年新低，在美国农业部出人意料地预测美国大豆收成将创下历史新高之后，交易商将重点放在了需求上。【原文：Soybean futures extended their decline to fresh 2020 lows with traders focusing on demand in the wake of the US Department of Agriculture’s surprise outlook for a record American harvest.】

item.title: Steward 的管理式医疗服务销售将医生从濒临倒闭的医院中分离出来
item.description: Steward 医疗保健系统将以 2.45 亿美元的价格出售其管理式医疗保健业务，这笔交易将使其初级保健医生与破产公司陷入困境的医院系统分离开来。【原文：Steward Health Care System is selling its managed-care businesses for $245 million, a deal that would keep its primary-care doctors separate from the bankrupt firm’s troubled hospital system.】

item.title: 星巴克新任 "梦想 "首席执行官市值达 300 亿美元
item.description: 星巴克公司（Starbucks Corp.）的投资者从来没有像今天这样对该公司的股票报以如此高的评价，因为有消息称这家咖啡连锁巨头聘请了Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc.的首席执行官布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）担任新的领导。【原文：Starbucks Corp. investors have never rewarded the stock more than they have today on the news that the coffee chain giant hired Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc.’s Chief Executive Officer Brian Niccol as its new leader.】

item.title: 乌克兰为何在冲突中首次入侵俄罗斯
item.description: 乌克兰对俄罗斯领土的闪电式干预表明，一场显然陷入长期僵局的战争仍有可能带来惊喜。对俄罗斯西部库尔斯克地区的进攻开始一周多后，乌克兰军队似乎守住了他们占领的地区。俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京在两年多的激战中未能推翻基辅领导层，现在又要应对外国对其国家的首次入侵，这让他很尴尬【原文：Ukraine’s lightning intervention into Russian territory shows that a war apparently stuck in a prolonged stalemate can still produce surprises. More than a week after the assault on Russia’s western Kursk region began, Ukrainian troops appeared to be holding areas they had seized. It’s an embarrassment for Russian President Vladimir Putin who, having failed to topple the leadership in Kyiv in more than two years of intense fighting, is now grappling with the first foreign invasion of his country】

item.title: 什么是动量交易，出了什么问题？
item.description: 动量交易的基本理念很简单：买入赢家，卖出输家。【原文：The basic idea behind momentum trading is simple: Buy winners, sell losers.】

item.title: 上市在即，申银万国聘请前欧盟官员加强游说工作
item.description: Shein 已聘请一名前欧盟高级官员加强其在整个地区的游说工作，在计划于伦敦股市上市的同时，对潜在的监管审查采取更加积极的态度。【原文：Shein has enlisted a former top European Union official to bolster its lobbying efforts across the region, taking a more active stance toward potential regulatory scrutiny as it plans a stock market debut in London.】

item.title: 干旱威胁水力蓄水池，巴西转向液化天然气
item.description: 由于干旱天气威胁到巴西庞大的水电生产，巴西已成为全球液化天然气供应的最新竞争者。【原文：Brazil has emerged as the latest contender for global liquefied natural gas supplies as dry weather threatens its vast hydropower production.】

item.title: Saba 的温斯坦和 TCW 认为信贷市场应倾听股票的 "恐惧指数"。
item.description: 股票市场和债券市场对美国经济衰退的可能性发出了不同的信号，导致一些主要投资者认为信贷方面存在太多的自满情绪。【原文：The stock and bond markets are sending different signals about the likelihood of a US recession, leading some major investors to say there is too much complacency in credit.】

item.title: 交易商寻求套利交易，CME 上的锂流动性大增
item.description: 芝加哥商品交易所集团公司（CME Group Inc.【原文：Liquidity in CME Group Inc.’s lithium contracts is on the rise again, with financial players looking to benefit from arbitrage opportunities in the market that’s key to the energy transition.】

item.title: 波兰图斯克指责央行行长以鹰派政策拖累经济增长
item.description: 波兰总理唐纳德-图斯克（Donald Tusk）再次对央行行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）发起攻势，称当前的货币政策阻碍了经济增长。【原文：Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk went on a renewed offensive against central bank Governor Adam Glapinski, saying current monetary policy was holding back economic growth.】

item.title: 加拿大养老金计划出售西班牙不良债务投资组合
item.description: 加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）已将西班牙不良贷款投资组合挂牌出售，该基金正努力减少其在过去十年金融危机期间积累的对该国的风险敞口。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board has put a portfolio of distressed Spanish loans up for sale, as the fund works to reduce its exposure to the country built up during the financial crisis last decade.】

item.title: 前投资银行家面临支付 1400 万欧元的德国税务丑闻账单
item.description: 一名前伦敦投资银行家在德国首次非法 Cum-Ex 交易审判中被定罪，他现在必须支付四年多前法院对他判处的 1400 万欧元（1530 万美元）的罚款。【原文：An ex-London investment banker, convicted in the first German trial over illegal Cum-Ex trades, must now pay a €14 million ($15.3 million) bill a court imposed on him more than four years ago.】

item.title: 奥特曼支持的核电公司将使用西门子电力系统
item.description: 由亿万富翁山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）支持的先进核反应堆开发商 Oklo 公司同意在其发电厂中使用西门子能源公司的部件，此举旨在加速其技术的应用。【原文：Oklo Inc., a developer of advanced nuclear reactors backed by billionaire Sam Altman, agreed to use components from Siemens Energy in its power plants, a move aimed at accelerating the deployment of its technology.】

item.title: 加纳饱受打击的塞地货币可能终于得到喘息机会
item.description: 分析师预计，从现在到 12 月大选期间，加纳受创的第纳尔在经历了年初的暴跌后只会小幅走弱。【原文：The worst may be over for Ghana’s battered cedi, with analysts expecting it to only weaken modestly between now and December elections following steep falls earlier in the year.】

item.title: 安大略教师基金回报率达 4.2%，任命前布鲁克菲尔德公司执行首席财务官
item.description: 安大略教师养老金计划在今年上半年取得了 4.2% 的回报率，因为该计划增加了股票和大宗商品的投资，并减少了信贷投资。【原文：Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan delivered a 4.2% return in the first half of the year as it boosted exposure to stocks and commodities and trimmed back on credit.】

item.title: 英国计划建立电网连接以加快浮动海上风电场的建设速度
item.description: 随着英国去碳化进程的加快，英国电力系统运营商制定了一项计划，将三个拟建的浮动海上风电场与电网连接起来。【原文：The UK’s electricity system operator has designed a plan to connect three proposed floating offshore wind farms with the grid, as the country’s decarbonization drive picks up speed.】

item.title: 生产者物价指数不及预期，国债反弹
item.description: 在一份弱于预期的美国生产者价格报告支持美联储今年更积极地削减借贷成本之后，国债走高。【原文：Treasuries advanced after a weaker-than-expected US producer prices report bolstered the case for the Federal Reserve to cut borrowing costs more aggressively this year.】

item.title: 巴西作物迄今未受霜冻影响，阿拉比卡咖啡涨势逆转
item.description: 阿拉比卡咖啡期货在纽约下跌，原因是市场猜测头号生产国巴西的作物不会像人们担心的那样受到霜冻破坏。【原文：Arabica coffee futures dropped in New York on speculation the crop in top producer Brazil won’t be as frost-damaged as feared.】

item.title: 印度消费需求放缓引发降息呼声
item.description: 一些经济学家表示，印度消费需求放缓以及对全球经济的担忧可能促使印度央行考虑降息，尽管人们对通货膨胀忧心忡忡。【原文：India’s slowing consumer demand and concerns over the global economy could push the central bank to consider interest rate cuts despite worries over inflation, some economists say.】

item.title: WH 集团认为猪肉需求疲软导致中国猪价下跌
item.description: 据世界头号猪肉生产国称，在供应充足、需求低迷的情况下，预计下半年中国猪价将下跌。【原文：China’s pig prices are expected to fall in the second half of the year amid ample supplies and sluggish demand, according to the world’s top pork producer.】

item.title: 嘉吉公司收入较历史最高水平下降近 10
item.description: 嘉吉公司（Cargill Inc. ）最近一个财年的收入减少了近 10%，这是全球最大的农作物贸易商在连续两年创下销售记录后遭遇的挫折。【原文：Cargill Inc. took a revenue hit of almost 10% in its most-recent fiscal year, a setback for the world’s biggest crop trader after two straight years of records sales.】

item.title: 尼日利亚银行集团称暴利税可能影响资本重组
item.description: 一个行业组织表示，对尼日利亚贷款机构的外汇收益征收 70% 的暴利税，对一个面临经济逆风的行业来说是过重的负担，而且可能会阻碍运营商为满足收紧的资本规定而做出的努力。【原文：A 70% windfall tax on Nigerian lenders foreign-exchange gains is an excessive burden on a sector that’s facing economic headwinds and may hamper efforts by operators to meet tightened capital rules, an industry group said.】

item.title: 兴登堡继续关注阿达尼集团，目标清单不断扩大
item.description: 在兴登堡研究有限责任公司（Hindenburg Research LLC）首次对阿达尼集团提出欺诈指控 18 个多月后，这家美国做空机构已成功地将其视角扩大到印度第二富豪所经营的企业集团之外，从而使这一传奇事件继续成为焦点。【原文：More than 18 months after Hindenburg Research LLC first leveled fraud allegations at the Adani Group, the US short seller has managed to keep the saga in the spotlight by widening its lens beyond the conglomerate run by India’s second-richest man.】

item.title: 中国对加拿大矿业开采和加工限制的考验
item.description:
紫金矿业集团股份有限公司正在就限制外国 国家投资国内外项目的规定向特鲁多政府提出挑战。【原文：

Zijin Mining Group Co. is challenging the Trudeau government over rules limiting foreign state investment in projects at home and abroad.

item.title: 德国制造商 Viessmann 从 D Cubed 收购 KPS Global
item.description: 德国制冷系统制造商 Viessmann 集团已同意收购 KPS Global LLC，以进一步拓展其在北美的洁净和冷藏室业务。【原文：Viessmann Group, a German manufacturer of refrigeration systems, has agreed to acquire KPS Global LLC to further the expansion of its clean and cold room business in North America.】
